overview: A short film by Albert Champeaux. "First animated short film from Champeaux studios produced in 1958. Satire of visit to Paris by a group of tourists and a provincial. A short film widely distributed in the cinema, winning a large number of awards in festivals. It is the first collaboration of A. Champeaux with the chansonnier Jacques Baudoin, who provides commentary on the film. A very modern creation in drawing and realization even today. A beautiful portrait of Paris from the 50s and 60s." - https://youtu.be/BVIa6Pw3POs
title: Paris Flash
